code.title: Happy Thoughts
code.description: A fully functional e-commerce store built with React and Redux. It features a user-friendly interface, product filtering, and a secure checkout process.

code.title: Weather app
code.description: A responsive web-based application that fetches real-time weather data through API integration. Focused on a clear user flow and modern design.

code.title: Recipe Library
code.description: A deliciously simple web app where users can explore a world of recipes. Designed for smooth navigation and a tasteful user experience.
